question: 1. What is the definition of wazifa and is it permissible in islam to do wazifas for any particular problem. 2.Threading or waxing of eyebrows is allowed in islam
answer:
QUESTION
To begin with ,I really admire the painstaking attention,effort and time you people take in answering the questions.InshaAllah the unflinching devotion of all the people concerned with the work will vastly improve the site. I have some questions too! 1.What is the definition of wazifa and is it permissible in islam to do wazifas for any particular problem. 2.Threading or waxing of eyebrows is allowed in islam,if not what is the alternative ? 3.Is it permissible in islam to use creams,lotions for the hair removal of certain body parts(e.g.under arms,etc.). 4.Is nikkha allowed if the women has periods that time. 5.Is it necessary in islam ,on the first day of marriage, the groom should meet the bride. Thanks for your time
ANSWER


Share:
Make Du?aa that Allah Ta?ala grant us steadfastness and Ikhlaas (sincerity) and may He accept what we do, Aameen.%0D%0A%0D%0A1. The word Wazifa literally means amount. The word is generally used as a descriptive noun for specified wages, gifts, specific recitals, etc. Allah Ta?ala has mentioned in many places in the Qur?aan the recitals (Wazifas) of many prophets at the time of their difficulties. Such recitals are significant and beneficial in removing one from similar difficulties.%0D%0A%0D%0A2. Mullah Ali Qari (R.A) has commentated that plucking of the facial hair is haraam (prohibited) for a woman with the exception of moustache or beard hairs, if any woman is unfortunate enough to be troubled by these. (Mirqaat Vol.8 Pg.295; Ashrafiyyah). However, if the eyebrows have become so dense that it is unseemly for a woman and incites abhorrence in her husband, it is permissible to trim it to a more appropriate and normal size. (Ahsanul Fataawa Vol.8 pg.76; Zakariyya Book Depot)%0D%0A%0D%0A3. It is permissible to use any hair removing cream which does not have any Haraam ingredient in it to remove unwanted hair under the armpits and below the navel.%0D%0A%0D%0A4. Nikah performed during a female experiencing menses is valid. However, if the spouses plan to live with each other immediately after marriage, it is advisable to adjust the date against the time of her periods to facilitate immediate intimacy between the spouses as the resistance against intimacy may not be effective.%0D%0A%0D%0A5. It is Mustahabb.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai
